project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement text file reading and word counting functionality
Implement functionality to identify and display the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the word counting and top 10 functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
